extendedInfo.description: Looking for the ultimate mobile/tablet shopping experience? Save time and money with the Dillons App! The Dillons App puts convenience and savings at your fingertips. Simply download the app, create an account and register your Dillons Shopperâs Card to take advantage of all these great benefits:Load online coupons directly to your Shopperâs Card and your shopping list.Create an online shopping list that you can update and use any time.View Weekly Ads and quickly add Weekly Ad items to your shopping list.Access exclusive promotions and save money with personalized offers.Refill your Dillons Pharmacy prescriptions directly from your phone or tablet. Type or scan your prescription number and select your Pharmacy to schedule a convenient pickup time.Check your fuel points and view your rewards history.Use the store locator to find stores and fuel centers nearby.To use the Dillons App, you must first have a Dillons online account. Register online at www.dillons.com. Be sure to register your Shopperâs Card to take advantage of all these benefits. Donât have a Shopperâs Card? Get one on the spot when you visit any one of the Kroger Family of Stores.Your Dillons App helps you save at any of the Kroger Family Stores which include: Kroger, Bakerâs, City Market, Dillons, Food 4 Less, Foods Co., Fred Meyer, Fryâs, Gerbes, Jay C, King Soopers, Owenâs, Pay Less, QFC, Ralphs and Smithâs.Coming Soon!Updates to the Shopping List will allow you to create multiple lists, save items as favorites and save money when you choose items from our Smart Suggest feature.Thank you for providing your feedback and suggestions. More updates are coming soon. Check dillons.com or Google Play for the latest digital news.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Even though it\'s a handy app, it could be a bit more user friendly.  Kel Bel
reviews.author: Kelly Williams

reviews.title: Ad feature and Shopping List Need Improvement
reviews.comment: Love the app. The only thing I wish they would fix is when you click on an ad item to view it then go back to the ad it starts you all over at the top so you have to scroll back down to where you were. It needs to take you back to where you were like it does when you are looking at the coupons. Also Im not happy with the shopping list feature. I wish they would put the sale price on the items so I dont have to look them back up in the ad.
reviews.author: Misty Crofford

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Love being able to see my coupons quickly and easily. Love that coupon items auto populate the shopping list!
reviews.author: Laura Ostrowski

reviews.title: Wont work
reviews.comment: It wont scan the item (and i tried scaning different ones) it doesnt give u the option of searching.
reviews.author: kaitlin pica

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It won\'t even install in my phone
reviews.author: April Gomez

reviews.title: Overall not bad
reviews.comment: Like the app. I can scan my prescriptions  and check much points. One thing I wish other would do is save my pharmacy telephone number permanently.
reviews.author: Craig McPherson

reviews.comment: Won\'t install on my Galaxy Note
reviews.author: Rachel Felt

reviews.title: Good but fails in store.
reviews.comment: Is there a conspiracy to not allow customers to add digital coupons in store? Seems like the app crashes and I can no longer use my grocery list unless I load it before getting near the store.
reviews.author: Jeremy Trostle

reviews.title: Easy!
reviews.comment: I love that i have my card with me always!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Motter

reviews.title: Print
reviews.comment: Like it, but would love to be able to print my list either to a PDF or to my wireless printer.
reviews.author: Jeff G

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.comment: The app is great! Super easy to just sit down and load/check coupons whenever. Definitely shaved off loads of money on groceries!!
reviews.author: Sydney Hostetler

reviews.title: Handy!
reviews.comment: This is so much nicer then using the web page to load coupons. Also very thrilling to watch my grocery bill go down 30 bucks with my Dillon\'s card.
reviews.author: Krystal Sako

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: This is a terrible app. My friend couldn\'t get it to download on her phone and when I downloaded it on my galaxy s3 it wouldn\'t let me create an account and it kept randomly refreshing in the middle of looking at it. Wish I could give it zero stars. Please fix because if it worked itd be great!
reviews.author: Danielle Morgan

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: Like it so far could be a little better but yea
reviews.author: Kara Haggard
